destinations.name: Hạ Long Bay
destinations.description: Hạ Long Bay is a UNESCO World Heritage Site located in Quang Ninh Province, Vietnam.

destinations.name: Angkor Wat
destinations.description: Angkor Wat is a temple complex in Cambodia and the largest religious monument in the world.

destinations.name: Machu Picchu
destinations.description: Machu Picchu is an Inca citadel located in the Andes Mountains in Peru.

details_destination.main_name_destination: Panoramic scene in Ha Long Bay
descriptions_destination: Ha Long Bay in northeast Vietnam, is known for its emerald waters and thousands of towering limestone islands topped by rainforests
Ha Long Bay is suitable for enjoying a vacation with family, friends or colleagues. You will discover the majestic and mysterious scenes of Vietnam
Activity: rock climbing and hiking, particularly in mountainous Cat Ba National Park
details_destination.highlight_destination: op places: Highly rated by recent guests Surrounding: There are hotels, restaurants and cafes around.
